maria.name: Maria Rodriguez
maria.content: The voice cloning feature is game-changing. Our customers can't tell they're talking to an AI. Conversion rates have never been higher.

hero.title: AI Sales Calls That Actually Convert

saveTime.title: Save 10+ Hours Weekly

qualityLeads.title: Higher Quality Leads

demo.callScript: Hi John! I'm calling from Spark AI. I noticed you've been looking at our sales automation solutions...

detailed.testimonial1: Increased our sales by 340% in just 3 months. The AI sounds so natural, prospects can't tell it's not human. ROI was immediate.
detailed.testimonial2: Saved 20 hours per week on cold calling. Our team now focuses on closing deals instead of prospecting. Game changer!
detailed.testimonial3: As a startup, we couldn't afford a sales team. This AI agent became our best salesperson, working 24/7 for a fraction of the cost.

chat.welcomeMessage: Hi! 👋 I'm here to help you get started with AI voice calling. How can I assist you today?

quickReplies.freeTrial: Can I try it for free?

responses.pricing: Great question! Our plans start at just $97/month for the Starter plan, and $297/month for Professional. We're currently offering 50% off your first 3 months + free setup (worth $500)! Would you like me to show you the details?
responses.freeTrial: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. You can test all features and see real results. Plus, we have a 30-day money-back guarantee. Ready to get started?
responses.demo: I'd love to show you! Our AI makes natural-sounding calls 24/7, qualifies leads, and books meetings automatically. You can try our interactive demo right now, or I can schedule a personalized demo call. What sounds better?
responses.setup: Getting started is super easy! Just upload your contact list, choose your AI voice, and launch. Setup takes only 5 minutes, and we provide free onboarding. Would you like me to walk you through it?
responses.default: That's a great question! Let me connect you with one of our AI calling experts who can give you a personalized answer. In the meantime, you can try our free trial or check out our demo. What would you prefer?

exitIntent.title: Wait! Don't Miss Out! 🚨
exitIntent.subtitle: Get 50% OFF your first 3 months + FREE setup (Value: $500)
exitIntent.emailLabel: Enter your email to claim this offer:
exitIntent.privacy: 🔒 We respect your privacy. No spam, ever. Unsubscribe anytime.

success.title: 🎉 You're In!
success.message: Check your email for your exclusive 50% discount code. This offer expires in 24 hours!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answer common questions simply. Focus on removing doubts about pricing, setup, or features.

cost.question: How much does it cost to get started?
cost.answer: Our Starter plan is just $97/month with no setup fees. We also offer a 14-day free trial so you can test the system risk-free. Plus, we're currently offering 50% off your first 3 months!

setup.question: How long does setup take?
setup.answer: Setup takes just 5 minutes! Simply upload your contact list, choose your AI voice, and you're ready to go. Our team provides free onboarding to ensure you get the best results.

natural.question: Does the AI sound natural?
natural.answer: Yes! Our AI uses advanced voice synthesis technology that sounds completely human. 99% of prospects can't tell they're talking to an AI. You can even clone your own voice for a personal touch.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
satisfaction.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the results, we'll refund your money, no questions asked. We're confident you'll love the results!

integration.question: Can I integrate with my existing CRM?
integration.answer: Absolutely! We integrate with all major CRMs including Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive, and more. All call data and leads are automatically synced to your existing system.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Show that your solution is easy to implement. Describe the process in 3 simple steps.

step1.title: Upload Your Leads
step1.description: Simply upload your contact list or connect your CRM. Our system automatically imports and organizes your prospects.

step2.title: AI Makes the Calls
step2.description: Our AI agents call your prospects, qualify them, and schedule meetings. All conversations are natural and engaging.

step3.title: Close More Deals
step3.description: Focus on qualified leads and close more deals. Get detailed reports on every call and conversion.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our AI Calling System
benefits.subtitle: Highlight your product's key advantages - 24/7 functionality, seamless integration, and superior efficiency.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: Your AI sales agent never sleeps, never takes breaks, and never misses a call. Work around the clock to capture every opportunity.

integration.title: Seamless Integration
integration.description: Works with your existing CRM, email tools, and sales processes. No disruption to your current workflow.

efficiency.title: Superior Efficiency
efficiency.description: Make 10x more calls in the same time. AI handles the repetitive work while you focus on closing deals.
